#summary How to setup your local system and install the STS webapp
#labels sts,keytool

= Setting up the environment =
Let's assume you have a web application server with a 1.5 runtime (i.e. Tomcat 5.5.x). For this article, let's assume you have Tomcat isntalled at _/usr/local/apache-tomcat-5.5.20/_
==Keystore Setup==
 # Choose a path and location for the keystore: ( _i.e. /opt/myXmldapInfocardKeystore.jks)
 # generate a key using _keytool_: > keytool -genkey -keyalg rsa -keystore /opt/myXmldapInfocardKeystore.jks
